nounusedchunks.backupprompt.removeuninha:
Removes all chunks that were never inhabited by a player.
While this may reduce the world size by a lot, keep in
mind that this may also remove chunks you might need,
without actually having visited them. For example, this
may end up removing chunks modified by another mod or a
tool or a program. Please back up your world before
doing this, and make sure the chunks got removed properly.
